title: BSC Collateral Cap Change: Raise Collateral Cap of CREAM on BSC Market
body:
Intro: This is a vote to update the collateral cap of CREAM on BSC. 

Proposal: Via Listing Committee

Rational: Raise the collateral cap of CREAM on BSC market from 2,000,000.00 crCREAM to 4,000,000.00 crCREAM. Currently, collateral cap has been reached and users are not able to use CREAM for additional collateral. 

For: 
Raise collateral cap of CREAM on BSC market to 4,000,000.00 crCREAM

Against:
 Do nothing.
author: 0x81f8CaBe89066d43EB4faFD8E4E5256C102E6E30
